text: "Hold the Line" is a 1978 debut single by American rock band Toto and is the lead single from their debut studio album Toto. It went to number 1 in South Africa, number 3 in Sweden, number 5 in Canada and the United States, number 8 in Australia, number 11 in New Zealand, number 14 in the United Kingdom and number 19 in Italy. It went to number 69 in Poland in 2019. Category:1978 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Toto (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Arena rock songs
title: Hold the Line
